author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: Most required features
description: Пользователи GameChanger запросили множество функций, которые были решены, но мы задерживаемся на других ключевых функциях, которые хотим сделать приоритетными.

f6_assessments.q0: It's odd that there's no obvious challenge were this proposal fits, but that is the case and i agree with the decision of the proposers to place it in the Miscellaneous challenge.This proposal sets itself to  improve and add new features based on user feedback (the problem statement) to this independently develop wallet. I believe it to be critical for the Cardano mission that multiple wallets are independently developed, as this adds resilience and variety to the ecosystem
f6_assessments.q1: I've tested the GameChanger wallet in the past out of curiosity, just by depositing and sending ADA, the interface was easy to use and well designed and it's clear that the proposers have the skills and experience to implement these improvements and new features. The proposal clearly presents what "bug fixes" and new features it wants to complete as well as a brief description on how to achieve each of these (the What and the How). The timings for completion seem realistic. No budget breakdown is presented and only 9k is requested which doesn't seem like much. This doesn't really affect my assessment of the feasibility of this proposal as the objectives and plans are well laid out, but it's always good to see a budget breakdown and to know if part of the proposal will be self-funded.
f6_assessments.q2: A roadmap with clear milestones and timings is presented as well as relevant KPI's which will allow the community to audit and progress and success of this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal requires funds to improve features of the game wallet created for the Cardano ecosystem. The team is active in the community and the project has something directly to do with the Cardano ecosystem, thus for me, the proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The team provided bios and links to LinkedIn for verification. The team is active in the Cardano ecosystem has developed a gamified wallet, given the history and experience, I believe the team will implement the plan successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a single line budget and a detailed roadmap. I would like the team to connect the detailed roadmap with milestones to the budget, in this way the team can track performance vs. expenditure over time. Furthermore, I would like to see the team add measurable goals to the KPIs identified – create/sign up/ X number by Y date – fix 10 bugs by month 3, etc. As the proposal stands at the moment it might be challenging to audit.

f6_assessments.q0:
I've used the Avalanche Wallet which is accessible through a website, and I love its simplicity. I created a GameChanger wallet and loved the clean and simple look. I sent 1 ADA to the wallet to test it out but unfortunately it's not appearing. I am also receiving this error message : "External server error. Request failed with status code 503".

There are some cool features like NFT creator, smart send, and asset showcase. I tried to mint a potato through the dapp Cart too. I am getting error message 'Could not retrieve slot number'. From what I've seen this wallet can be very impactful to the Cardano community IF it works properly. Unfortunately, I do not have the technical knowledge to assess the problems I faced or the feasibility of the proposal. I can say however that if everything works properly, as an NFT collector, this wallet would be a (pun intended) game changer.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal includes information on the team members' experience and skill set. The budget is not outlined, but I assume it is to pay the team members. Some information on the budget would be helpful. The amount asked for and the roadmap is modest, however, so I think this is not a big problem. There is enough time spent on the technical side of things in the proposal for someone more knowledgeable than me to assess.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is lacking information on the budget. But there is enough information on the roadmap to track progress. Is it possible to include target number of new wallets/connectable dapps/active users so a success metric can be established to determine if the project is a success?

solution: Мы выслушали вас, GameChangers! И мы предлагаем сосредоточиться на тех функциях, о которых вы просили больше всего.
experience: Мы создали GameChanger, наш продукт - это высоко гуманизированный и геймифицированный кошелек. Мы ориентированы на новичков, студентов и строителей.
